title: Emerald and Ruby Kundan Pendant Haaram - 'Pachala Manikyam Haram'
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a classic South Indian design, meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans. The design features a continuous strand of lush green emeralds, each paired with a cluster of dazzling Kundan set uncut diamonds in a floral motif. The centerpiece is a striking teardrop cabochon ruby pendant, surrounded by a Kundan diamond halo, creating a captivating focal point. The gold is finished with a traditional Hyderabadi polish, enhancing its rich luster and antique appeal.

description: This 'Pachala Manikyam Haram' is a timeless investment piece that blends traditional craftsmanship with exceptional gemstone quality.
